hero.subtitleFinal: , takes you through iconic monuments, mysteries and local legends.

problem.title: Too much time wasted,
problem.subtitle: Cultural information about cities and tourist itineraries is abundant and fragmented.
problem.issue1Desc: Average time spent searching for information
problem.issue2Desc: Blogs, forums, classic guides... all saying different things
problem.issue3Desc: And in the end, you don't really know what to see

solution.title: What if just
solution.subtitle: Chat Heritage transforms your tourist visit into an interactive and surprising experience. Let Leo guide you!
solution.step3Desc: To start the chat-guide with Leo!

benefits.title: An experience
benefits.subtitle: Discover the benefits of exploring Venice with Leo by your side!
benefits.card1Desc: No app to download. Just your smartphone and WhatsApp.
benefits.card2Desc: Route choices, quizzes and questions to Leo. The WhatsApp chat-guide is in text and audio format.
benefits.card3Desc: Stories researched by experts, faithful reconstructions, engaging narrations.

tours.title: Choose your
tours.subtitle: Each tour is a unique journey through history, art, mysteries and legends. Start now for free!
tours.tour1Desc: The beating heart of Venice: from the Rialto district to the majestic Piazza San Marco, passing through secret alleys.
tours.tour2Desc: The most cultural and colorful district of Venice: from Ca' Rezzonico to Punta della Dogana, passing through some of the most iconic places.

testimonials.title: What people
testimonials.subtitle: The experiences of those who have already decided to explore Venice with Leo.
testimonials.review1Text: Finally a different way to visit Venice! Leo is so much fun and the stories about the mysteries kept us glued. Highly recommended!
testimonials.review2Text: The AR features blew my mind! Seeing historical reconstructions while standing in the actual spots was incredible. A must-try!
testimonials.review3Text: As a Venetian, I thought I knew everything about my city. Leo showed me corners and stories I didn't know. Surprising!

faq.title: Have any
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions
faq.q1: Do I need to download an app to use Chat Heritage?
faq.a1: No! Chat Heritage works entirely on WhatsApp, an app you certainly already have. No need to download anything, register or create an account. Just access our website and click the 'Try for free' button to start chatting with Leo right away.
faq.q2: How long does a tour last?
faq.a2: Our tours last on average between 60 and 90 minutes, but you decide the pace! You can stop, take breaks, go deeper or skip sections. Leo adapts to your timing.
faq.q3: Can I use Chat Heritage even if I'm not in Venice?
faq.a3: Absolutely! You can explore the content, listen to stories and take quizzes from home. The complete experience with maps and augmented reality is designed to be lived on-site, but you can prepare for the trip or relive memories from afar.
faq.q4: What languages is it available in?
faq.a4: Currently Chat Heritage is available in Italian, English, German, French and Spanish. We are working to add more languages soon. Leo speaks your language!
faq.a5: Currently you can try the first tour for free. Stay tuned to try other free tours available during the pre-launch phase!

cta.title: Don't visit Venice.
cta.subtitle: Enough boring guides! Enough wasting time!
cta.subtitleLine2: Enter the secret heart of the city right now.

chiSiamo.heroSubtitle: How a group of history and technology enthusiasts decided to revolutionize the way to discover Venice.
chiSiamo.missionPassionDesc: We love Venice and its thousand-year history. Every corner tells a story that deserves to be heard.
chiSiamo.missionInnovationDesc: We use artificial intelligence to make culture accessible to everyone, everywhere and anytime.
chiSiamo.missionCommunityDesc: We believe history should be shared, not guarded. We want to create a community of curious explorers.
chiSiamo.founder1Bio: Growing up during his university studies among the streets of Venice, Francesco developed a deep passion for the history of the Serenissima. After years in the tech sector, he decided to combine his two passions to create Chat Heritage.
chiSiamo.founder1Quote: We want every visitor to feel like a Venetian returning home.
chiSiamo.founder2Bio: Design expert and marketing enthusiast, Gianluca curates the image and communication of Chat Heritage. His creative vision makes every interaction with Leo a unique and engaging experience.
chiSiamo.founder2Quote: Technology must serve culture, not the other way around.
chiSiamo.founder3Bio: With solid technical skills and an unbridled passion for web development, Simone built the digital platform of Chat Heritage. His experience ensures a smooth and intuitive user experience.
chiSiamo.founder3Quote: Every tourist deserves to experience Venice like a local, not like a number.
chiSiamo.founder4Bio: Architect and IT Manager, Edoardo manages the technological infrastructure of Chat Heritage. His vision combines architectural design and digital innovation.
chiSiamo.founder4Quote: The stories of Venice are infinite. Our job is to bring them to life.
chiSiamo.timeline1Desc: During a walk in Venice, the idea was born to create an intelligent tourist guide accessible via WhatsApp. No app to download, just conversation.
chiSiamo.timeline2Desc: We develop Leo, the virtual lion of San Marco who becomes the voice of Chat Heritage. A friendly, cultured and always available travel companion.
chiSiamo.timeline3Desc: We launch the first route: from Rialto to San Marco, with 6 stops and over 80 anecdotes including mysteries, legends and historical curiosities.
chiSiamo.timeline4Desc: New routes coming: Dorsoduro, Cannaregio and much more. The journey continues and Venice still has many stories to tell!
chiSiamo.ctaSubtitle: Discover Venice like you've never seen it. Leo is waiting for you!

contatti.heroSubtitle:
Have questions or want to know more?
We're here to help.
contatti.socialSubtitle: Stay updated on the latest news and discover exclusive content

footer.description: Making culture immediate and accessible. Chat Heritage, active on WhatsApp, offers interactive and geolocated itineraries with deep and authentic narration. No app, instant use. We optimize the visitor experience and enhance the heritage and art cities.
